animeTitle: Dragon Ball Z Special 1: Tatta Hitori no Saishuu Kessen
animeDescription: Bardock, Son Goku's father, is a low-ranking Saiyan soldier who was given the power to see into the future by the last remaining alien on a planet he just destroyed. He witnesses the destruction of his race and must now do his best to stop Frieza's impending massacre.  (Source: ANN)
animeRelated: ['Dragon Ball Z', 'Dragon Ball: Episode of Bardock']
